name: PermissionCheck
signal_source: Privacy studies show users need tools to 'regularly delete unnecessary apps, revoke excessive privacy-invading permissions'
description: App permission auditor that helps users understand and minimize unnecessary permission requests
target_user: Privacy-aware users who install many apps but struggle to monitor and control permission requests over time
pain_point_evidence: Users report 'many people give permissions without even bothering to read what they're asked to do' and need permission awareness
differentiation: Permission education vs. just blocking, focuses on awareness and control over blanket restrictions
subscription_fit: Premium includes real-time monitoring, detailed risk analysis, and family account management

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic scan, premium for monitoring and detailed analysis
